articles.title: Lion DNA convicts poachers in world first
articles.description: Investigators reveal how they were able to identify a missing animal using a database of lions in Zimbabwe.

articles.title: Shastri brushes off Abhishek Sharma’s form dip; fires warning to South Africa, Zimbabwe, Windies: ‘They’ll be worried’
articles.description: India remains confident in Abhishek Sharma despite his three consecutive ducks, as they advance unbeaten to the Super 8s of the T20 World Cup 2026. | Cricket

articles.title: Rahul Dravid Picks His Preferred T20 World Cup Finalists: 'Zimbabwe Vs...'
